• true: Enables the ability to use the AV1 codec to encode screen sharing tracks. This can result in improved screen sharing quality for clients that support it.

displayname: Use data channels for signaling media tracks (Plugins - Calls)
description:
• true: Clients will use WebRTC data channels for signaling of media tracks (i.e., voice, screen). This can result in a more efficient and less race-prone process, especially in case of poor network connections.
  • false: (False) Clients will use WebSockets for signaling media tracks.

description:

  • true: (Default) Join/Leave messages are displayed.
  • false: Join/Leave messages are hidden.

displayname: Enable users to open direct message channels with (Users and Teams)
description:
This setting determines whether a user can open a direct message channel with anyone on the Mattermost server or only to members of the same team.

  • Any user on the Mattermost server: (Default) Users can send a direct message to any user through the Direct Messages > More menu. config.json setting: "any"
  • Any member of the team: The Direct Messages > More menu only allows direct messages to users on the same team. config.json setting: "team"

This setting determines how names appear in posts and under the Direct Messages list.

  • Show username: (Default) Displays usernames. config.json option: "username".
  • Show nickname if one exists...: Displays the user’s nickname. config.json option: "nickname_full_name".
  • Show first and last name: Displays the user’s full name. config.json option: "full_name".
